name: Splash Beverage Group, Inc.
description: Splash Beverage Group, Inc. is a rapidly growing beverage company focused on developing and marketing a diverse portfolio of premium beverage brands. Founded in 2020, Splash Beverage aims to capitalize on the increasing demand for unique and high-quality beverage options. The company's flagship products include its popular sports drink, TapouT, and a variety of flavored rums. The company is dedicated to innovation in the beverage sector, ensuring that its offerings appeal to health-conscious consumers and enthusiasts alike. With a commitment to quality and sustainability, Splash Beverage is exploring additional product lines and collaborations to expand its market reach. The company utilizes a strategic distribution network that includes both direct-to-consumer channels and partnerships with major retailers. Splash Beverage is also focused on enhancing brand visibility through targeted marketing campaigns and sponsorships in the sports and entertainment industries. As the beverage industry continues to evolve, Splash Beverage is well-positioned to become a leader in the segment, driven by its dedication to product excellence and customer satisfaction.

seo.meta_title: Splash Beverage Group, Inc. | Premium Beverage Brands
seo.meta_description: Explore Splash Beverage Group, Inc., a leader in premium beverage products including sports drinks and flavored rums. Discover our innovative brands and commitment to quality.

faq.question: What types of beverages does Splash Beverage Group offer?
faq.answer: Splash Beverage Group offers a variety of products including sports drinks and flavored rums.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Splash Beverage Group?
faq.answer: Robert Nistico is the CEO of Splash Beverage Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Splash Beverage Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Splash Beverage Group is headquartered in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What is the flagship product of Splash Beverage Group?
faq.answer: The flagship product of Splash Beverage Group is the TapouT sports drink.

faq.question: When was Splash Beverage Group founded?
faq.answer: Splash Beverage Group was founded in 2020.
